title: LP System
body: Can we fix this fucking LP system it's imposible to climb with all these fuckwits i have to play with. Look at my match history for proof if you want.

replies.body: It's not impossible to climb just focus on yourself and you'll get there

If you are not one of the fuckwits you are statistically more likely to be on a team with less fuckwits. The enemy team gets fuckwits too.
You might be extremely unlucky, but that is extremely unlikely. The common factor is you, and you are what you need to focus on improving.
You have a 45% win rate out of your last 20 games, so why do you deserve to be higher exactly?
Coz fukwits, didnt you read? LOL
